html:
Art of Lighting

This module will prepare you for lighting multiple mediums of work based on various styles of cinematography, video game lighting, and general lighting theory such as exposure, composition, and mood. You will apply these skills to content inside a game engine using a mixture of metahumans, megascans and free marketplace assets.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Comprehend the various processes used by lighting systems within a games engine.

+  Apply appropriate lighting, rendering techniques, and shader solutions to 3D models to produce a high-quality visual output.

+  Identify and solve complex lighting related issues for both dynamic and static lighting workflows.

+  Communicate and critically review the development of your lighting and re-lighting workflows, evaluating the effectiveness of the chosen techniques in the lighting pipeline.

Module Content:
